name: RR CLI Plugin
description: Git + OpenAI integrated CLI tool for smart commits, code analysis, and learning
author: Kelly Project

commands.name: rr-commit
commands.description: Generate AI-powered commit message from staged changes
commands.help: Generate smart commit message and optionally commit

commands.name: rr-analyze
commands.help: Analyze FILE with optional analysis TYPE (security/performance/architecture)

commands.name: rr-suggest
commands.description: Get AI suggestions for improving code

commands.name: rr-teach
commands.help: Get detailed, microscopic-level explanation of TOPIC with code examples and deep dives

commands.name: rr-ask
commands.help: Ask a QUESTION to the AI

commands.name: rr-help
commands.description: Show RR CLI help and documentation

steps: Set OpenAI API key: export OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-...
